memberdef.argsstring: (hid_t f, char *run, char *state, integer n, particle_state *p)
memberdef.name: hdf5_state_write

briefdescription.para: Writes marker state to an ASCOT5 HDF5 file.

detaileddescription.para: All fields in particle_state struct are written. Fields are written as they are except some unit conversions. Each field is written as n length array (the order is same between all fields) and each dataset includes string attribute that indicates the unit of the stored quantity.

parameterdescription.para: run group where the state is written
number of markers in state array

briefdescription.para: Module for writing marker state to HDF5 file.
